issues.message: Remove this conditional structure or edit its code blocks so that they're not all the same.
Rename function "_filePath" to match the regular expression ^(_|[a-zA-Z0-9]+)$
Add a description to this table.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "Asset %s not found" 3 times.
Add a description to this table.
Rename function "Test_dedupPorts" to match the regular expression ^(_|[a-zA-Z0-9]+)$
Add a description to this table.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "expected nsenterFunc to be called" 5 times.
Add a description to this table.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "expect using mockInterceptRuleMgr, actual %v" 5 times.
